channel.title: Music – Jessica
channel.description: Recent content in Jessica on Music

item.title: Jessica - Starry Night
item.description:
기억하니 넌?
우리 처음 눈 맞춘 날
설렘 가득했지
생각해보니
매 순간이 참 고마워
너의 그 예쁜 진심

때론 어둠 속에서 서롤 지켜줬지
We belong we belong together
그 누구도 우릴 갈라놓을 수 없어
이 세상 그 무엇도

기억해 starry night
한 여름 밤 내게 꿈처럼 온 별들
그렇게 또 우린 한걸음 한걸음 가까워졌지
You gotta let me know
같은 곳 바라보잔 약속
그래 그 약속
절대 잊지 않고 잊지 않아
Do you remember that starry summer night?

또 기억하니 넌?
수줍은 내 첫 노래를
나의 멜로디를
하지만 난 말야
내 마음을 꽉 채워준 건 너의 예쁜 목소리

때론 어둠 속에서 서롤 지켜줬지
We belong we belong together
그 누구도 우릴 갈라놓을 수 없어
이 세상 그 무엇도

기억해 starry night
한 여름 밤 내게 꿈처럼 온 별들
그렇게 또 우린 한걸음 한걸음 가까워졌지
You gotta let me know
같은 곳 바라보잔 약속
그래 그 약속
절대 잊지 않고 잊지 않아
Do you remember that starry summer night?

지난날들의 추억은 소중히 간직해줘
앞으로의 우리들이 난 기대되는데
Ooh
I’ll be yours forevermore
We belong we belong
We belong we belong together

기억해 starry night
한 여름 밤 내게 꿈처럼 온 별들
그렇게 또 우린 한걸음 한걸음 가까워졌지
You gotta let me know
같은 곳 바라보잔 약속
그래 그 약속
절대 잊지 않고 잊지 않아

Do you remember(우리 처음 본 그 순간)
Do you remember(그 예쁜 golden sky)
Do you remember that starry summer night?

item.title: Jessica - To Be Able To Love
item.description:
작곡: A.Carlsson.., K.Lundin / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8998

I won’t make
no commitments no
I can’t let myself
just go
As much as I want to
my heart says no
I’m sorry but
I can’t stay
I hope that
you’ll forgive me
When I say darling
I don’t have a heart
For you right now
somebody’s playing
With my mind but
all I’m dreaming of
Is to be able to love
woo yeah
I can’t give you
no guarantees
If that’s what
you want from me
I should have known
better but now you see
I’m sorry but
I can’t stay
I hope that
you’ll forgive me
When I say darling
I don’t have a heart
For you right now
somebody’s playing
With my mind but
all I’m dreaming of
Is to be able to love
woo yeah
But all
I’m dreaming of
Is to be
able to love
All I want is
to treat you right
But I know
I can’t pretend
It will take
just a little longer
Finding the key
to love again
Don’t have a heart
I need sometime
All I’m dreaming of
is to be able to love
Darling
I don’t have a heart
For you right now
somebody’s playing
With my mind but
all I’m dreaming of
Is to be able
to love
Don’t have a heart
for you right now
Somebody’s playing
with my mind
But all
I’m dreaming of
Is to be able to love
able to love-

item.title: Jessica - GOODBYE
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: FOSTER DAVID, THOMPSON LINDA
KY: 5740 / KY: 7787

I can see the pain
living in your eyes
And I know how
hard you try
You deserve to have
so much more
I can feel your hurt
and I sympathize
And I’ll never
critisize
All you ever meant
to my life-
I don’t want to
let you down
I don’t want to
lead you on
I don’t want to
hold you back from
Where you might
belong
You would
never ask me why
My heart is
so disguised
I just can’t
live a lie anymore
I would- rather
hurt myself
Than to ever
make you cry
There’s nothing
left to say
But goodbye
ah- goodbye-
You deserve a chance
at the kind of love
I’m not sure I’m
worthy of
Losing you is painful
for me
I don’t want to
let you down
I don’t want to
lead you on
I don’t want to
hold you back
From where you
might belong
You would never
ask me why
My heart is
so disguised
I just can’t
live a lie anymore
I would rather
hurt myself
Than to ever
make you cry
There’s nothing
left to say-
But
goodbye-

You would never
ask me why
My hurt is
so disguised
I just can’t
live a lie anymore
I would- rather
hurt myself
Than to ever
make you cry
There’s nothing
left you try
No it’s gonna
hurt us both
There’s no other way
than to say goodbye
Uhm—-
goodbye-

item.title: Jessica - Lost Without Your Love
item.description:
작곡: David Gates / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 6852 / KY: 20411

Lost and
all alone
I always thought
that I could
Make it on my own
since you left
I hardly make it
throught the day
My tears
get in the way
And I need you
back to stay
I wander through
the night
And search the world
to find the words
To make it right
all I want is
Just the way
it used to be
With you here
close to me
And I’ve got
to make you see
That I’m lost
without your love
Life without
you isn’t worth
The trouble of
and I’m as helpness
As a ship
without a wheel
A touch
without a feel
I can’t believe
it’s real
And someday
soon I’ll wake
And fine my heart
won’t have to break
I wander through
the night
And search
the world to find
The words
to make it right
All I want is just
the way used to be
With you here
close to me
And I’ve got to
make you see
That I’m lost
without your love
Life without
you isn’t
Worth the trouble of
and I’m as helpness
As a ship
without a wheel
A touch
without a feel
I can’t believe
it’s real
And someday
soon I’ll wake
And find my heart
won’t have to break-

Yes I’m lost
without your love
Life without you isn’t
worth the trouble of
And all I want is
just the way
It used to be
I need you here
With me oh darlin’
can’t you see
If we had
love before
We can have it
back once more-

item.title: Jessica,김민종 - Love You For All Time
item.description:
작곡: 김현철 / 작사: AS ONE
KY: 62383

When I close my eyes
you’re all that I see
And you’re always
with me in my dreams
We’ll be together
now and forever
Til the end of time
with each passing day
I’m filled
with no doubt
That it’s you whom
I just can’t live
Without
now and forever
We’ll be together
til the end of time
Even though
we may be miles apart
You will always
be here in my heart
It’s only you
that I need
Cuz you’re love
makes me complete
Long as I know
you’re part of my life
I’ll love you
for all time-
Everynight I wish
that you’re by my side
And I can’t help
but wish you’d
Hold me tight
always together
Love you forever
til the end of time-
Even though
we may be miles apart
You will always
be here in my heart
It’s only you
that I need
Cuz you’re love
makes me complete
Long as I know
you’re part of my life
I’ll love you
for all time
Though for now
you’re far away
My love is
here to stay
Cuz you’re
a part of me-

It’s only you
that I need
Cuz you’re love
makes me complete
Long as I know
you’re part of my life
Even though
we may be miles apart
You will always
be here in my heart
It’s only you
that I need
Cuz you’re love
makes me complete
Long as I know
you’re part of my life
I’ll love you
for all time-
